alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 12:29AM EDT until March 31 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville affecting Talbot, Taylor, Crawford and Upson Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Carsonville...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville. * WHEN...From early this morning to early Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 32.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
